messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 599
messages.msgSnippet: ... We have two computers and we have come to a system of sharing resources. :) I worried about Nintendo taking over so we rented one at first but the use has
messages.messageBody:
> Message: 15
> Date: Fri, 08 Nov 2002 00:12:23 -0800
> From: Joylyn <joylyn@...>
> Subject: Re: Video Game Advice
>
> well said sandra. Also, our playstation use goes in spurts. Weeks and
> weeks can go by with no usage and then Lexie will play it almost
> constantly for hours and hours, days and days. It's really good for her
> fine motor skills, and she has fun so...
>
> We do need another computer though, she has discovered the internet. So
> now there are three users and one computer. Not a good number. I need
> to get a job.


We have two computers and we have come to a system of sharing resources. :)

I worried about Nintendo taking over so we rented one at first but the use has
been moderate. My husband and I were way more addicted to an old game off of
the commodore 64 called Toy Factory... I'd love to play that again.

Someone sent me this url yesterday, it looks pretty cool:

http://www.ferryhalim.com/orisinal/

Peggy
